column6: Legal actions for anti-competitive behavior, anti-trust, and monopoly practices
Tax governance, control, and risk management
column7: The parent and wholly-owned Australian-controlled entities have implemented the tax consolidation legislation. The parent entity and the controlled entities in the tax consolidated group account for their current and deferred tax amounts. These tax amounts are measured as if each entity in the tax consolidated group continues to be a standalone taxpayer in its own right.

column6: Tax governance, control, and risk management
column7: The Company may decide to employ the auditor on assignments additional to their statutory audit duties where the auditor's expertise and experience with the Group are essential. The Board of Directors has considered the position and, by advice from the Audit and Risk Management Committee, is satisfied that the provision of the non-audit services is compatible with the general standard of independence for auditors imposed by the Corporations Act 2001.

column6: Stakeholder engagement and management of concerns related to tax
Materials used by weight or volume
Reclaimed products and thei packaging materials

column8: Improving efficiency in the road sector
column13: QUBE Holdings double-stacked container trial, purchase and design trailers to increase volume by double stacking. 90% of the fleet transitioned to Euro 5/6 standard and adaptable to Biofuels, with ~78% of the fleet meeting Euro 6 standards, which has ~80% lower PM and 68% lower Nox emissions compared to Euro 4 and below models.\t
column20: Fleet Transition, Emission Reduction, Sustainability Measures

column8: Improving efficiency in the rail sector
column13: QUBE Holdings digitalisation and monitoring systems aim to optimise fuel consumption. Implementing the EcoRun driver advisory system could reduce fuel by ~3% to 7%. Engine modification on overhaul to improve fuel efficiency and emission could result in ~2% to 5% efficiency improvements.
column20: Fuel Consumption Optimization, Eco-friendly Practices, Technology Implementation

column13: A continuous program of assessing sites with potential for solar rooftops. In FY23, we consumed ~400MWh of on-site renewable energy in our premises.
column20: On-site Renewable Energy, Solar Rooftops, Sustainability Initiatives

column6: Energy consumption outside of the organization

column8: Bell Bay Itv - The Apple Of The Apple IsleÃ¢ÂÂs Eye
column13: As we continue to explore partnership opportunities and new technologies to reduce our emissions footprint, the QUBE Holdings Ports team at Bell Bay in Tasmania recently trialled a new electric Inter-Terminal Vehicle (ITV). The Gaussian APM 75T Battery was built in Australia by Newport and uses simple battery swap technology, allowing for seamless and continuous operation.
column20: Electric Inter-Terminal Vehicle (ITV), Emission Reduction, Technology Innovation

column8: World First Partnership Helping To Make Electric Vision Reality
column13: QUBE Holdings was also delighted to partner with OZ Minerals and Janus Electric in a trial of the world's first electric triple road train. Through the Vision Electric project, Janus Electric has converted a diesel truck owned by QUBE Holdings into an electric truck, which will provide decarbonised on-road logistics support to OZ Minerals' Carrapateena operations and shipping in South Australia.
column20: Electric Triple Road Train, Decarbonization, Sustainable Logistics

column13: Clear policy, regulation and a trained workforce are required to support the hydrogen transition. While these challenges exist, QUBE Holdings is in discussions with several parties on the potential for conducting hydrogen trials where it is commercially feasible, noting that hydrogen vehicles are still around two times more expensive than internal combustion engine vehicles and hydrogen fuel costs need to be at around $2 to $3 per kilogram for commercial viability.
column20: Hydrogen Transition, Alternative Fuels, Sustainable Transportation

column13: In partnership with OZ Minerals, Janus Electric and Vision Energy, we are conducting a 12-month trial of battery-swapping technology in South Australia. The trial will give us valuable data and experience to expand these trials in other regions and environments. We are also exploring several EV truck trials on the East Coast.
column20: Battery-Swapping Technology, Electric Vehicle Trials, Sustainability Initiatives

column13: We are reviewing several options to trial biofuel/ renewable fuels. However, this would be subject to commercial viability and collaboration from our Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) and our end customers. We anticipate that changes to regulatory settings and government policies will support the development of a biofuel industry in the Australian market over time.
column20: Biofuel Trials, Renewable Fuels, Regulatory Support

Interactions with water as a shared resource
column7: We are committed to safeguarding the environment by complying with environmental laws, regulations, and standards and managing the potential impacts on air, water and land.

column6: Operational sites owned, leased, managed in, or adjacent to, protected areas and areas of high biodiversity value outside protected areas
Significant impacts of activities, produces, and services on biodiversity
column13: Biodiversity management is an area of increasing focus and attention globally. The Taskforce on Nature-Related Financial Disclosures (TNFD) aims to create a new reporting framework to mitigate risks connected to the natural world. The UN Convention on Biodiversity has called for governments to stabilise biodiversity losses within 10 years.
column20: Biodiversity Management, TNFD Compliance, Nature Conservation

column7: While we continue to closely monitor developments and potential reporting obligations in this critical area, as a proactive measure, QUBE Holdings already responds to potentially negative impacts on biodiversity by ensuring appropriate protections where these operations overlap with protected areas or areas of high biodiversity value.

column6: IUCN Red List species and national conversation list species with habitats in areas affected by operations
